App.description: GloRe is an open network that aims to enlarge its audience both of volunteers and NGOs all over the world to make certificates available to everybody.

Common.errorMessage: Please try again or <contactUs>contact us</contactUs> if the problem persists
Common.notFoundMessage: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved
Common.syncErrorMessage: A synchronization error occurred, please refresh the page

Auth.loginSubtitle: Enter an email or username to login to your account
Auth.networkError: A network error occurred, please try again
Auth.passwordResetMessage: You will receive soon an email with a link to reset your password.
Auth.passwordResetSubtitle: Enter your email or username to receive a password reset link.
Auth.signupDialogMessage:
Currently, you can sign up to GloRe only with an invitation from your organization.

If your organization is part of the GloRe network and you want to get access as a volunteer, tutor or coordinator, ask a representative to send you an invitation.

For more information, please visit our website.
Auth.signupMessage: Don't have an account? See <link>how to sign up</link>

Users.role: {role, select, representative {Representative} tutor {Tutor} volunteer {Volunteer} learner {Learner} other {}}

Courses.completeLessonsToProceed: Complete all previous steps to proceed
Courses.correctAnswerMessage: Great job, you've understood this concept correctly.
Courses.description: GloRe offers a wide range of learning courses to help you develop your soft skills and knowledge. Each course is designed to be interactive and engaging, providing you with the tools you need to succeed in your personal and professional life. After completing at least 3 courses, you will be able to request a certificate of completion.
Courses.descriptionAdmin: As an admin, you can manage the courses available on the platform. You can create and publish new courses, edit existing ones, and archive courses that are no longer relevant.
Courses.descriptionEditor: As an editor, you can create, edit and translate courses across the platform.
Courses.notFoundMessage: The course you are looking for does not exist or has been moved
Courses.questionsSubtitle: Reply with true or false to the following {count, plural, =1 {statement} other {statements}} and test your knowledge.
Courses.replyToProceed: Complete {type, select, questions {the quiz} skill_evaluation {the evaluation} subskill_evaluations {all evaluations} other {}} to proceed
Courses.skillEvaluationSubtitle: How would you rate your general skills in this area?
Courses.lessonType: {type, select, descriptive {Reading} questions {Quiz} skill_evaluation {Self-assessment} subskill_evaluations {Self-assessment} other {Step}}
Courses.subskillEvaluationsSubtitle: Give a score from 1 to 5 to {count, plural, =1 {the following statement} other {each of the following statements}}.
Courses.title: Learning courses
Courses.wrongAnswerMessage: Don't worry, you can always review the material again.
Courses.reviewModeMessage: In review mode you can interact with all the steps of the course, but your replies can't be changed
Courses.completedTitle: Congratulations, you've completed {count, plural, =1 {your first} =2 {your second} =3 {your third} other {another}} course!
Courses.completedTitleAll: Congratulations, you've completed all the courses!
Courses.completedMessage: Review the steps or go back to all courses to continue your learning.
Courses.completedRequestCertificate: You can now request a certificate to verify your skills!
Courses.completeIncludeInCertificate: You can now include this course in your certificate!

Courses.unpublishCourseMessage: The course will not be visible on the platform

Certificates.description: GloRe certificates are an official recognition of your volunteering experience and acquired soft skills. They are issued by GloRe and can be shared on your social media profiles or added to your CV. You can request your certificate after completing at least 3 courses with a final evaluation of at least 3 out of 5.
Certificates.notFoundMessage: The certificate you are looking for does not exist or has been moved
Certificates.title: Your certificate
Certificates.certificateMessagePost: carried out a volunteer activity at {org}, during which they demonstrated commitment, team spirit, and interpersonal skills, acquiring valuable soft skills.
Certificates.requestCertificateTitle: You can now request your GloRe certificate!
Certificates.requestCertificateMessage: Create your certificate and wait for a member of your organization to approve it.
Certificates.invalidCoursesTitle: You can't request a certificate at the moment
Certificates.invalidCoursesMessage: You've rated some of your skills less than {rating} starts. You need a higher grade to request a certificate. Go back to the courses section to complete new courses and get higher ratings.
Certificates.missingCoursesTitle: You need to complete more courses to request a certificate
Certificates.missingCoursesMessage: We require you to complete at least {count} learning courses to request a certification. Go back to the learning section to complete more courses.
Certificates.alreadyHave: You already have a certificate with this organization
Certificates.cantRequest: You can't request a certificate yet
